content.html: Night train from Kyiv yesterday, sharing a cabin with a guy. Broad shoulders, late 30s We both settle in, exchange some niceties. His hand is shaking After a while, he smiles awkwardly. Seems embarrassed "I dont want to worry you. Just... if I cry at night.. its nothing" ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¦ðŸ’”
content.value:
Night train from Kyiv yesterday, sharing a cabin with a guy. Broad shoulders, late 30s

We both settle in, exchange some niceties. His hand is shaking

After a while, he smiles awkwardly. Seems embarrassed

"I dont want to worry you. Just... if I cry at night.. its nothing"
